page.title: 02SKENE SCHOOL
page.content: {Skene school}is very small and old. It was built around the beginning of the twentieth century. Miss Jamieson is the headteacher of the school and has been for four years. She is one of four teachers .There are 75 pupils split into four classes p1/2,p3/4,p5/6 and a small p7. Their school uniform is a grey skirt or trousers,blue or white shirt or blouse and the school tie is a light blue stripe and a dark blue stripe. Skene school was a secondary before it was converted to a primary in 1965. There are two sport's days per year.One is an intersports when they compete against Echt,Clunie,Midmar and Dunecht.The other is a school sport's day. The school has no full_time janitor so p7 are responsible for duties such as ringing the bell,getting mail etc.
